Text: HighSchoolAlumnicom ReLaunches SiteHighSchoolAlumni User Do you remember the last time you visited HighSchoolAlumnicom Well regardless of how long its been wed like to invite you back to take a look at some great new features In an ongoing effort to improve our service weve made the following changes Size Weve added more than new high schools bringing our total to over Design Navigation The site not only looks better but also provides easier navigation to assist you in reconnecting with alumni from your school My Start Page Your very own customized start page which gives you easy oneclick access to all of our tools Enhanced Search Capability To track down a friend from another school even if you cant remember the name of the town Dont worrywe still have the features and services that youve come to love and that have made HighSchoolAlumnicom the best site of its kind Alumni Watch Well notify you via email when someone registers to any school and any class year that you choose Alumni Message You can send messages to your long lost friends without ever leaving the site Tell Your Friends about HighSchoolAlumnicom Just think if you tell two friends and they tell two friendsyour class listing will be packed with profiles of alumni that you might not have spoken with in years Whether high school was last year or years ago your friends are waitingCome back and help us celebrate our relaunch Reconnect Herewwwhighschoolalumnicom As always if you have any suggestions on how we can improve the site wed love to hear from you Please email us at mailto
